comment.author: 82472771@N08
comment._content:
Initials: R L W
First name: richard Louis Whittington
Surname: Bartlett
Rank: Lance Cororal
Service No: G/51986
Regiment: Royal Fusilers (London Regiment)
Add Regt. Info:  "A" Company 22nd Battalion
Commemorated:  British
Age: 37
Date of Birth: 17/02/1917
Parents: James Levi and Eleanor Bilton Bartlett.
Awards:  Unknown
Campaign Medals: Victory Medal, British War Medal.

22nd (Service) Battalion (Kensington)
Formed at White City, 11 September 1914, by the Mayor and Borough of Kensington.
June 1915 : attached to 99th Brigade, 33rd Division.
Landed at Boulogne in November 1915.
25 November 1915 : transferred with Brigade to 2nd Division.
3 February 1918 : disbanded in France

comment._content: 網上派傳單工作 於網上宣傳資訊，時間自由，多勞多得，無論是退休、在職或兼職人士也適合工作。 每天只需用電腦工作2-4小時, 便可賺取額外收入。 一間全球最大公司，現正物色一些合作拓展市場的伙伴。 有正職的朋友, 可以在正職的同時, 多了解這個機會, 從兼職開始; 没有工作的朋友, 更加要把握機會, 讓自己成功。 更多資料請登入以下網址 www.money.wfh8.com

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: He married Eva Jeanne Beattie, daughter of Egbert James Beattie, in 1910. The following year they were living at 52 St Johns Park Mansions, Pemberton Gardens, Upper Holloway, London.
